Description.Name: Thunder LRM Ammo
Description.Details:
Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Ammo Bins will explode and destroy their installed location when they receive a Critical Hit.

Thunder missiles scatter powerful anti-personnel mines over a wide area, packing enough explosive force to damage the legs of many BattleMechs. Thunder LRM Ammo Bins hold the same number of shots per ton as standard LRM ammunition bins.
